articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Greets Ghanaian President
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Greets Ghanaian President 
 Pyongyang, March 5 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme Peopleâ€™s Assembly of the DPRK, Friday sent a message of greetings to John Evans Atta Mills, President of Ghana, on the occasion of the 53rd anniversary of its independence.
					 Kim in the message expressed belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries with long tradition would develop on a new higher stage and wished the President good health and happiness and success in his work.

articles.title: Pak Ui Chun Greets New Danish FM
articles.content:
Pak Ui Chun Greets New Danish FM 
 Pyongyang, March 5 (KCNA) -- Foreign Minister Pak Ui Chun Thursday sent a message of congratulations to Lene Espersen upon her appointment as foreign minister of Denmark.
					 The message wished her success in her new job.

articles.title: Persons of Merit in 2.8 Vinalon Awarded Commendations
articles.content:
Persons of Merit in 2.8 Vinalon Awarded Commendations
 Pyongyang, March 5 (KCNA) -- A ceremony of awarding official commendations to officials, scientists, technicians and workers of the February 8 Vinalon Complex who rendered distinguished services in putting the complex on modern lines took place in Hamhung Friday. 
					 The officials and workers of the complex replaced all the existing production processes with new ones and put the vinalon production process on CNC basis, thus completing huge modernization project in a matter of two years. 
					
					 Present at the ceremony were Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly, Thae Jong Su, chief secretary of the South Hamgyong Provincial Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, and officials, workers and technicians of the complex and relevant units. 
					
					 74 persons were awarded the title of Labour Hero of the DPRK and gold medal (hammer and sickle) and Order of the National Flag 1st Class and seven persons honorary titles.
					
					 Watches bearing the august name of President Kim Il Sung were conferred on 27 persons and letters of commendation of General Secretary of the WPK Kim Jong Il on 22.
					
					 Orders and medals went to 2 389 persons.

articles.title: Officials Visit 2.8 Vinalon
articles.content:
Officials Visit 2.8 Vinalon
 Pyongyang, March 5 (KCNA) -- Senior party, army and state officials, leading officials of party organs, working people's organizations, ministries and national institutions and chief secretaries of provincial committees of the Workers' Party of Korea visited the February 8 Vinalon Complex on Friday.
					The workers of the complex, true to the on-site instructions given by General Secretary Kim Jong Il to update the complex associated with the undying leadership feats of President Kim Il Sung as required by the new century, successfully completed the difficult and vast project in a matter of two years and are mass-producing vinalon cotton and other chemical products.
					
					 The visitors went round the Revolutionary Museum of the complex and a room dedicated to the history of the complex.
					
					 They were struck with admiration to see the updated comprehensive chemical base and vinalon cotton streaming out of the modern vinalon production process.
					
					 They also visited modern agrochemicals and dye production processes.

articles.title: Advantageous Educational System Praised
articles.content:
Advantageous Educational System Praised
						
 Pyongyang, March 5 (KCNA) -- Foreign visitors to the DPRK lavished their praises of the free educational system in the DPRK after witnessing the reality in which everyone is given an ample opportunity of learning thanks to the state care. 
					 Zhang Jinquan, head of the delegation of the experimental primary school in Fusong County, China, said after visiting Kim Song Ju Primary School that the visit helped grasp well the true meaning of the teaching of President Kim Il Sung that children are "kings" of the country. The President spared nothing for the development of the education in the country, he noted, and went on:
					
					 The universal eleven-year compulsory education is in force in the DPRK. The achievements made by the DPRK in education are the precious fruition of the wise leadership of Kim Il Sung and          Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Tran Tho Chu, head of the delegation of the Vietnam-DPRK Friendship Club, said that members of its delegation who studied in the DPRK realized the advantages of the educational system in the DPRK.
					
					  Mark Flowers, head of a friendship delegation of New Zealand, had this to say:  The Grand People's Study House is standing in the best place of the capital and it is huge in its scale and best in its architectural contents. A lot of people study hard in the house. We were deeply impressed to see them.
					
					 Yusei Takara, head of the Japanese delegation for the study of the Juche idea, said after visiting the e-library of Kim Chaek University of Technology: General Secretary Kim Jong Il has always paid deep attention to the development of the nation's science and technology.
					
					 He expressed the belief that the students studying at the university would make a positive contribution to the drive for scaling the eminence of ultra-modern science.

articles.title: Orchestral Music "Arirang" Rich in National Emotions
articles.content:
Orchestral Music "Arirang" Rich in National Emotions
						
 Pyongyang, March 5 (KCNA) -- Included in the program of a performance given by the State Symphony Orchestra of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea is a mixed orchestral piece "Arirang".
					 The unique piece properly meets the Korean people's aesthetic taste and the requirements governing the development of orchestra, based on national musical instruments combined with foreign ones.
					
					 It, created in a new method on the theme of the famous Korean folk song "Arirang", largely consists of three parts depicting the miserable life of the Korean people in the past before the liberation of the country, their desire for a new life and their happy life in the present.
					
					 It is enthusiastically acclaimed by the audience for its peculiar, multiple tones and rich volume.

articles.title: Great Leadership for Realizing Long-cherished Desire of Peasants
articles.content:
Great Leadership for Realizing Long-cherished Desire of Peasants
						
 Pyongyang, March 5 (KCNA) -- President Kim Il Sung promulgated "Law on Agrarian Reform in North Korea" on March 5 Juche 35 (1946) to realize the Korean peasants' centuries-old desire.
					 When Korea was liberated from the Japanese imperialists' rule, the land issue was of great importance in the colonial agricultural country where the peasants were making up an overwhelming majority of the population.
					
					 Without solving the issue, it could neither eliminate the economic foothold of the reactionary forces in the countryside nor ensure the social democratic development.
					
					 That is why the President gave priority to successfully carrying out the agrarian reform in the implementation of socio-economical reforms.
					
					 He often went to rural areas including Taedong County, South Phyongan Province, to acquaint himself with their actual conditions and need of peasants for land and find out a solution to the land issue.
					
					 He analyzed the complicated feudal land ownership and confirmed objects of land confiscation, methods of land confiscation and distribution and ways of abolishing the tenant system for good before promulgating the historic law.
					
					 He, with it as the main principle of the agrarian reform to make toiling peasants true owners of land, advanced a policy of effecting the agrarian reform on the principle of confiscation and distribution without compensation and conversion of the confiscated land into the ownership of peasants, not into the state property.
					
					 Therefore the land reform was concluded successfully throughout the country in a matter of some 20 days. Over one million hectares of land were confiscated from Japanese imperialists, pro-Japanese elements, traitors to the nation and landlords without compensation and distributed free of charge to over 720,000 households of peasants with no or less land.
					
					 The land reform propelled the development of overall economic sectors in the country.

articles.title: Cancellation of Anti-DPRK Nuclear War Exercises Urged
articles.content:
Cancellation of Anti-DPRK Nuclear War Exercises Urged
						
 Pyongyang, March 5 (KCNA) -- The U.S. and south Korean warmongers should immediately cancel the projected adventurous anti-DPRK nuclear war exercises though belatedly, not resorting to suicidal act of igniting the fuse of a war for aggression on the DPRK.
					 Minju Joson Friday says this in a signed commentary.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 The United States and the south Korean puppet army are working with bloodshot eyes to make a preemptive attack on the DPRK any moment while staging Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military exercises.
					
					 What merits serious attention is that they are still running reckless even after the publication of the statement of a spokesman for the General Staff of the Korean People's Army.  Those moves are absolutely intolerable as they are a blatant challenge to the DPRK that has exerted sincere efforts to defend peace on the Korean Peninsula and security of the Korean nation and achieve independent reunification of the country. 
					
					 Should the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet warmongers launch the joint military exercises for aggression defying the DPRK's repeated warnings, the KPA will react to them with strong military counteraction and, if necessary, mobilize all its offensive and defensive means including nuclear deterrent to mercilessly destroy their bulwark of aggression. 
					
					 War does not know any mercy. If they ignite a war against the DPRK, they will have a taste of the strong self-defensive war deterrent which the army and people of the DPRK have built under the banner of Songun. Only deaths await the aggressors, the commentary concludes.

articles.title: S. Korean Public Holds Meeting on 3.1 Anniversary of Uprising
articles.content:
S. Korean Public Holds Meeting on Anniversary of 3.1 Uprising 
 Pyongyang, March 5 (KCNA) -- More than 180 civic and public organizations of south Korea Monday held a meeting in the plaza outside the Seoul City Office on the occasion of the 91st anniversary of the March First Popular Uprising. 
					 Speakers said at the meeting that March 1 is the historic day the Koreans groaning at the point of the bayonet of the Japanese imperialists fought for the sovereignty and independence. They called for achieving the peace, reunification and prosperity of the nation, carrying forward the spirit of independence displayed by them that day.
					
					 They said that all the compatriots are faced with the tasks to achieve national reconciliation and hand down a reunified country to posterity.
					
					 Noting that the compatriots in the south and the north are the one nation that cannot live, divided into two, they called for putting an early end to the division of the country and demonstrating the spirit of the nation.
					
					 They declared that all the compatriots would get united to comprehensively escalate the actions to thoroughly implement the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration, achieve independent reunification and hold in check Japan's moves for the revival of militarism.

articles.title: S. Korean Organization Vows to Fight against Authorities'
articles.content:
S. Korean Organization Vows to Fight against Authorities' Suppression
						
 Pyongyang, March 5 (KCNA) -- The Teachers Trade Union in south Korea held a regular meeting in North Chungchong Province on Feb. 27 at which it issued a resolution.
					 The resolution denounced the authorities for their indiscriminate and wholesale suppression of the said trade union in a bid to destroy it.
					
					  Noting that protecting the trade union means defending the people and education, the resolution declared that all the members of the organization would wage an unyielding struggle against the authorities' suppression.
					
					 The organization will wage a stubborn struggle in solidarity with the people from all walks of life to judge the unpopular educational policy enforced by the present regime, it concluded.

articles.title: Struggle for National Independence Called for in S. Korea
articles.content:
Struggle for National Independence Called for in S. Korea
Pyongyang, March 5 (KCNA) -- The Solidarity for Implementing the South-North Joint Declaration in south Korea issued a statement on Monday in which it called on the people to turn out in the struggle to drive outside forces out of south Korea and achieve national independence.
					The United States has considered south Korea as a lever for meeting its political, military and economic interests as evidenced by its pressure for fully opening markets to its beef fraught with danger of mad cow disease and dispatching troops to Afghanistan again, the statement said, adding that, yielding to this, the south Korean authorities are hell-bent on sycophancy and servility to the U.S. 
					
					What is more deplorable is that the present regime made no scruple of talking nonsense that it would not question about Japan's past history, calling Japan's king "emperor," the statement noted, and continued:
					
					We will not remain a passive onlooker to this deplorable situation any longer. We will struggle to achieve national independence, strongly opposed to all sorts of oppression and coercive acts on the part of outside forces.
					
					The statement called upon all the Koreans to judge by their concerted efforts the present regime hell-bent on sycophantic and humiliating acts.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il dirige el Complejo Siderurgico Kim Chaek
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il dirige el Complejo Siderurgico Kim Chaek
Pyongyang, 5 de marzo (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, dirigio sobre el terreno el Complejo Siderurgico Kim Chaek (Kimchol) que avanza a pasos firmes en la delantera del gran auge.
					  El Dirigente recorrio largo tiempo varios procesos productivos incluyendo el taller de acero No.2, el de laminacion en caliente y el de acabado de los productos en caliente enterandose detalladamente del estado de renovacion tecnica y de produccion.
					
					  Viendo por mucho tiempo el grandioso aspecto de los materiales de acero que se producen en cadena en el moderno proceso de moldeo continuo de lingote en forma curva y el aspecto de trabajo de los grandes laminadores, estimulo cordialmente a los obreros que trabajan.
					
					  Es un gran exito el que los militantes del partido y otros trabajadores de la empresa incrementaron incesantemente la produccion de materiales de hierro y acero y, al mismo tiempo, prepararon la firme base material y tecnica para producirlos mediante la ingente labor para establecer estrictamente el sistema de produccion de acero Juche por el alto horno al estilo coreano, dijo y evaluo altamente los exitos laborales de ellos que logran incesante avance e innovacion sin saber ningun estancamiento momentaneo.
					
					  El metodo de no usar el coque y la gasificacion del carbon que se apoyan enteramente en las abundantes materias primas criollas devienen el principio que no se puede conceder jamas en el desarrollo de nuestra economia, apunto y enfatizo en que deben tomar por invariable linea de vida de la construccion economica esta linea cuya veracidad y vitalidad fueron confirmadas mediante la ardua lucha.
					
					  Senalo que la importantisima tarea que le incumbe al Complejo Siderurgico Kim Chaek es normalizar en un alto nivel la produccion de hierro colado y de acero apoyandose en la firme base productiva de acero Juche y, en particular, incrementar decididamente la produccion de materiales de acero laminado.
					
					  A fin de normalizar en un alto nivel la produccion de materiales de hierro y de acero en el Kimchol es particularmente importante realizar de manera audaz y magnanima la modernizacion, la introduccion de la tecnologia CNC, en todos los procesos de produccion, destaco y presento nuevas tareas combativas para el particular.
					
					  Para realizarlo en el maximo nivel dentro del corto tiempo, hay que movilizar todas las fuerzas de los potentes colectivos tecnicos del pais incluidas la Academia Estatal de Ciencias y la Universidad Politecnica Kim Chaek, menciono e ilumino el rumbo y los remedios para el particular. Y en el mismo terreno dio la solucion a los problemas pendientes.
					
					  Indico que las organizaciones del partido y los funcionarios deben prestar profunda atencion a la labor de intendencia de los obreros y ofrecerles las mejores condiciones de vida.
					
					  Agrego que los militantes del partido y otros trabajadores del Complejo deben seguir avanzando a todo galope en la primera linea del gran auge empleando el poderio del indoblegable espiritu.
					
					  El mismo dia, el Dirigente se entero de los detalles del estado de la renovacion tecnica y de produccion del Complejo 7 de Julio y la Fabrica de Fibras Quimicas de Chongjin e ilumino las tareas y los medios para incrementar de manera trascendental la produccion de fibras quimicas y otros articulos quimicos.
					
					  Evaluo altamente a los funcionarios, obreros y tecnicos de estas dos plantas que prepararon la base para llevar al nivel alto la produccion de articulos quimicos desplegando con energia el movimiento masivo de innovacion tecnica.
					
					  Asevero que la provincia de Hamgyong del Norte, que cuenta con un gran destacamento de obreros, debe ponerse debidamente en la delantera del nuevo y gran auge revolucionario.
					
					  Hizo hincapie en que las organizaciones del partido y entidades de masas, los organismos de administracion y economia y los funcionarios directivos de la provincia deben estructurar las labores organizativas y politicas conforme al aumentado fervor de las masas para crear un nuevo y gran salto e innovacion en todos los dominios de la construccion economica inclusive la industria metalurgica, la quimica y la mecanica.
					
					  En esta ocasion el Dirigente fue acompanado por el secretario responsable del Comite del PTC en la Provincia de Hamgyong del Norte, Hong Sok Hyong, los jefes de departamento del CC del PTC Kim Kyong Hui y Jang Song Thaek y los primeros subjefes de departamento del CC del PTC Ju Kyu Chang, Ri Je Gang y Ri Jae Il.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il presencia funcion de grupo de propaganda de unidad 264
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il presencia funcion de grupo de propaganda de unidad 264
Pyongyang, 5 de marzo (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, junto con los oficiales y soldados de la gran unidad combinada 264 del EPC, presencio la funcion del grupo de propaganda artistica de esta unidad.
					Los ejecutantes pusieron en la escena el coro "Al lado del General viven los soldados", el cuarteto masculino "Es la batalla ofensiva", el solo femenino y Pangchang "Un soldado con oidos a las espigas de arroz que se agitan", el poema y coro "Defenderemos a muerte la Direccion de la Revolucion" y otras diversas piezas.
					
					A traves de la funcion, ellos demostraron bien el invencible poderio del EPC crecido como poderoso ejercito sin rival en el regazo del gran comandante distinguido y la ferrea conviccion y voluntad de los militares del EPC de defender a costa de la vida a la Direccion de la Revolucion y llevar a feliz termino con las armas la causa revolucionaria del Juche siguiendo al partido.
					
					Muy satisfecho de que ellos hayan ofrecido la magnifica funcion con el elevado caracter ideo-artistico en que palpita el espiritu militar de Corea del Songun de aniquilar a los enemigos, el Comandante Supremo evaluo altamente el exito de la funcion y les dio agradecimiento.
					
					Senalo que los integrantes del grupo de propaganda artistica, como artistas del ejercito revolucionario, comparten la pena y la alegria con los soldados y les infunden con sus actividades combativas de propaganda artistica la invencible fe y el optimismo, la valentia y el coraje de aniquilar a los enemigos, y elogio el estilo revolucionario de lucha de ellos.
					
					Y presento a todos los integrantes las tareas programaticas que serviran de guia para desarrollar con mas vigor las actividades de propaganda artistica conforme a la demanda de la epoca del Songun.
					
					Le acompanaron en verla los jefes de departamento del CC del PTC Kim Kyong Hui y Jang Song Thaek, y los primeros subjefes de departamento del CC del PTC Ju Kyu Chang, Ri Je Gang y Ri Jae Il.

articles.title: Extranjeros elogian sistema de educacion de Corea
articles.content:
Extranjeros elogian sistema de educacion de Corea 
						
Pyongyang, 5 de marzo (ATCC) -- Los extranjeros quienes visitaron la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea no escatimaron sus elogios sobre el sistema de la ensenanza gratuita de esta tras ver la realidad en que todos los coreanos estudian a sus anchas bajo el beneficio del Estado.
					Zhang Jinquan, quien habia visitado la Escuela Primaria Kim Song Ju como jefe de la delegacion de la Escuela Primaria Experimental del distrito de Fusong de China, dijo que a traves de esa visita pudo saber claramente el verdadero significado de las instrucciones del Presidente Kim Il Sung de que los ninos son los "reyes" del pais.
					
					Y prosiguio que el Presidente no escatimo nada para el desarrollo de la educacion del pais.
					
					Se esta practicando plenamente en Corea la ensenanza obligatoria gratuita general de 11 anos, recalco y continuo que los exitos logrados en la rama docente de Corea se deben a la sabia direccion del Presidente Kim Il Sung y del Dirigente Kim Jong Il.
					
					El jefe de la delegacion del Club de Amistad Vietnam-Corea, Tran Tho Chu, senalo que los miembros de su delegacion, quienes habian estudiado en Corea, experimentaron practicamente cuan ventajoso es el regimen educacional de esta.
					
					Mark Flowers, jefe de la delegacion de amistad de Nueva Zelanda, dijo que fue levantado en un lugar mas bueno de la capital de Corea el Palacio de Estudio del Pueblo.
					
					Destaco que este centro de estudio para todo el pueblo es el primero tanto en su tamano como en su contenido, y anadio que muchos coreanos estudian con afan en este lugar, por lo que quedaron muy emocionados.
					
					Tras visitar la biblioteca electronica de la Universidad Politecnica Kim Chaek, Yusei Takara, jefe de la delegacion de Estudio de la Idea Juche de Japon, dijo que el Secretario General Kim Jong Il siempre presta profunda atencion al desarrollo cientifico y tecnico del pais, y expreso su conviccion de que los estudiantes de este centro docente haran gran aporte a conquistar la fortaleza de la ciencia sofisticada.

articles.title: Guerra no sabe piedad, ratifica Minju Joson
articles.content:
Guerra no sabe piedad, ratifica Minju Joson 
						
Pyongyang, 5 de marzo (ATCC) -- Los Estados Unidos y los belicistas surcoreanos no deben recurrir a la campana de provocacion de guerra de agresion contra la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, acto de suicidio, sino tienen que parar sin demora los aventureros ejercicios de guerra nuclear contra ella. 
					Asi advierte el periodico Minju Joson en un comentario individual difundido en su edicion de este viernes y prosigue:
					
					EE.UU. y los titeres surcoreanos actuan freneticamente para asestar en cualquier momento el ataque preventivo contra la RPDC al cabo de desarrollar los ejercicios belicos conjuntos "Key Resolve" y "Aguilucho". 
					
					Lo grave del caso es que despues de haberse publicado la declaracion del portavoz del Estado Mayor General del Ejercito Popular de Corea, EE.UU. y los belicistas surcoreanos siguen actuando con imprudencia. Esto deviene un abierto desafio nunca tolerable contra la RPDC que se esfuerza con sinceridad por preservar la paz de la Peninsula Coreana, defender la seguridad de la nacion y lograr la reunificacion independiente del pais. 
					
					Si los yanquis y los belicistas titeres surcoreanos perpetran tales ejercicios pese a las reiteradas advertencias de nuestra parte, responderemos con las fuertes contramedidas militares, y en el caso necesario destruiremos despiadadamente el bastion de agresores haciendo uso de todos los medios ofensivos y defensivos, incluso el disuasivo nuclear.
					
					La guerra no sabe nunca la piedad. 
					
					Si ellos desencadenan la guerra de agresion a la RPDC, seran escarmentados por el disuasivo de guerra de caracter autodefensivo consolidado por nuestro ejercito y pueblo bajo la bandera del Songun.
					
					A los agresores les tocara solo la muerte.
